mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CO_WORKER( IDX_CO_WORKER, CO_WORKER_ODER, COWORKER_NAME, DEVISION, DEPARTMENT, DEPARTMENT_SUB, JOB_TITLE, JOB_ROLE, TEL_NUM, MPHONE_NUM, EMAIL, IS_SHOW, REG_DATE) VALUES ( SEQ_CO_WORKER.NEXTVAL, #{co_worker_oder}, #{coworker_name}, #{devision}, #{department}, #{department_sub}, #{job_title}, #{job_role}, #{tel_num}, #{mphone_num}, #{email}, #{is_show}, SYSDATE )
